description:
The ZoneKnit™ Long Sleeve Zip Hood is a midweight layer designed to balance warmth and breathability when you’re on the move. This soft and stretchy layer features ZoneKnit™ engineered body mapping, combining Cool-Lite™ jersey fabric with strategic panels of Cool-Lite™ eyelet mesh offer enhanced breathability and temperature regulation. The fitted hood goes smoothly under a helmet, while zippered hand pockets and two side stash pockets secure all your essentials.

Silky-soft merino and TENCEL®, sourced from sustainable eucalyptus plantations, combine to create icebreaker Cool-Lite™, a luxurious fabric that naturally regulates your body’s microclimate. Inspired by nature, Icebreaker harnesses the performance qualities of natural fibers to offer an alternative to clothing based on petrochemical synthetics.
name: Icebreaker Merino Quantum ZoneKnit LS Zip Hoodie - Mens
